featured.headline: Anthropic accuses Chinese AI labs of mining Claude as US debates AI chip exports
featured.summary: Anthropic accuses DeepSeek, Moonshot, and MiniMax of using 24,000 fake accounts to distill Claude’s AI capabilities, as U.S. officials debate export controls aimed at slowing China’s AI progress....

secondary_1.headline: Google’s Cloud AI leads on the three frontiers of model capability

secondary_2.headline: OpenAI calls in the consultants for its enterprise push
